titles: An Apology and advice for some of the clergy, who suffer under false and scandalous reports written on the occasion of the second part of The rehearsal transpros'd, in a letter to a friend, and by him publish'd.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678. --  Rehearsal transpros'd the second part. --  Part 2.
